title: Season 8 Delay
body: I just played a game and then I felt some delays even tho I had 19-20ms. Later on I played 1v1 with my friend and still the same thing happened, I had 19-20ms and felt a lot of delays. Please fix riot thank you

replies.body: You could be having packet loss which your ping won't represent.  This can happen more often if on wifi as well!  Start off with a [power cycle](https://kb.netgear.com/19755/How-to-Power-Cycle-Your-Home-Network?cid=wmt_netgear_organic) to help as a start.
